text: Skazhi: "Voz'mu li ya pokrovitelem kogo-libo drugogo, krome Allakha, Tvortsa nebes i zemli? On daruyet propitaniye [drugim], no ne [nuzhdayetsya] v tom, chtoby propitaniye bylo darovano Yemu". Skazhi: "Voistinu, mne vedeno byt' pervym sredi vverivshikh sebya [Allakhu]. Tak ne bud'te zhe v ryadakh mnogobozhnikov
